sys_script_include.name: GetTeam12

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_3a21fe81074e20109400f0269c1ed0bb
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_568702_birthday.GetTeam12</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetTeam12</name><script><![CDATA[var GetTeam12 = Class.create();
GetTeam12.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	GetTeam: function()
	{
	gs.info("id:- "+gs.getUserID());
	var rec = new GlideRecord('x_568702_birthday_birthday');
	rec.addQuery('u_name', gs.getUserID());
	rec.query();
	var team = [];
	while(rec.next())
		{
			team.push( rec.getValue('u_team') );
		}
	gs.info("team:- "+team);
	return team;
	},

    type: 'GetTeam12'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-30 04:55:01</sys_created_on><sys_id>3a21fe81074e20109400f0269c1ed0bb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetTeam12</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Birthday" source="x_568702_birthday">20dfbdee07b920109400f0269c1ed01d</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Birthday">20dfbdee07b920109400f0269c1ed01d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3a21fe81074e20109400f0269c1ed0bb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-30 04:55:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
